An educational environment for learning Python,
suitable for beginners and children.
Inspired by LOGO.

Runs on Python 3.6/3.7, using wxPython, and PyInstaller.
Clip art is from https://openclipart.org
A massive "thank you!" to the developers of these projects,
as well as to the helpful folks at the user groups of these
projects, and at StackOverflow, who have helped solve many
problems that came up in the making of this program.
